preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 48.00 g of Iron (III) oxide using a precision scale. 
 2. Measure 4.00 g of Nickel (II) oxide. 
 3. Measure 32.00 g of Selenium and ensure it is in powder form. 
 4. Add 16.00 g of distilled water to create a slurry. 
 5. In a clean glass container, combine the powdered ingredients (Fe2O3, NiO, Se) and mix thoroughly until a uniform blend is achieved. 
 6. Gradually add the distilled water to the powdered mixture while stirring continuously to form a paste.
